trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged" /> or <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged" /> 或 <see cref="E:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged" /> 事件發生時，提供限定資訊給回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: 指定對等電腦顯示狀態所發生的變更類型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType" /> object containing data that specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType" /> 物件，其中包含的資料會指定對等電腦的顯示狀態所發生的變更類型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 指定其顯示狀態資訊已變更的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 與顯示狀態資訊已變更之 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> specified by <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A> is not associated with a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, this value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>所指定<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A>不與相關聯<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>，這個值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 指定其顯示狀態資訊已變更的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> on which the presence information has changed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" />，其上的顯示狀態資訊已變更。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the changed presence information of a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> as well as a string provided by <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> describing the updated presence status.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> 的已變更顯示狀態資訊，以及 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> 所提供的字串，描述更新的顯示狀態。

trans-unit.source: Changed presence information for <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> and a string describing the updated presence status.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> 的已變更顯示狀態資訊，以及描述更新的顯示狀態之字串。
